about_the_game:
"

Necessary Evil: Breakout (Revised Edition)

Rule the Concrete Jungle!
When all the super heroes of the world are blown to kingdom come by an army of invading aliens, who will save the day? The only forces left to take on the alien menace are the crafty and self serving super villains!
The villainous resistance of New York City was one of the last to hold out against the alien invasion. Warlord Sh'tarka placed most of troublesome Manhattan under a deadly and impassable energy shield. Now your villain has to fight for food, water, resources, and dominance.

The pulse-pounding follow-up to
Necessary Evil returns, revised for
SWADE and the
SPC , and with supplementary material for leading your own criminal gang now integrated into the book. While the villains of
Necessary Evil: Invasion fought to save the world, the Street Fighter (Power Level II) ruffians of
Breakout fight for their freedom (and their lives) in a New York City the aliens turned into a giant prison camp.
Breakout takes place before the events of
Invasion , so play it on its own, or as a piece of the larger story.
Revised for Savage Worlds Adventure Edition.
Necessary Evil requires the
Savage Worlds core rules and
Super Powers Companion to play. "
